text: Need Sophie Anderson for Amart Furniture campaign. Budget around $3,957, looking for 2 x 60-second YouTube video, 3 x Instagram reel, 3 x Pinterest pin, 1 x Twitter post, 2 x Product photography. 4 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs September 2025. Usage rights for 6 months. Engagement period: 3 months. Need to confirm: deliverables
